On the 30th anniversary of Ronald Reagan 's inaugural, National Review Online spoke with Mike Pence about the Gipper, asking what his legacy means to him and the GOP. Ronald Reagan is the reason I'm a Republican, Mike Pence tells us. "I was active in local Democratic politics when I was a teenager in Columbus, Indiana. for the invasion of Iraq in a famous session of the UN Security Council and then, in Donald Rumsfeld 's words, claiming that he was "somehow innocently misled into making a false declaration." Rumseld writes: Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody, nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie. The Congress did not lie. The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Donald Rumsfeld , in his book, is particularly galled that Colin Powell issued an apology for the looting of Baghdad's Iraqi National Museum and vowed to recover stolen artifacts.
